title: Cannabis Stocks: Keep It Simple
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: After decades of long/short equity investing for hedge funds on the sell side, Mike Regan switched to covering the cannabis space for MJBizDaily. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss the similarities between the internet bubble and the cannabis market today and what we can glean from those bubble valuations. We also cover why capital structure is key, vertical integration in nascent industries, understanding margin potential, cannabis in Canada vs. US, and the challenges in the CBD market. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
